ForgotPassword.TITLE_TEXT: If you have forgotten your password, enter your email address that you used to create an account to receive your password.

Home.TITLE_TEXT: If you want to claim or claim status please choose one below
Home.PROCESS_TEXT: You have made your trip and you wish to make a claim after a bad experience, feel free to express your opinion on your new online claim platform www.oncf2255.ma
Home.MAKE_ONLINE_CLAIM_SUB: Remember to keep your travel ticket to make your claim
Home.FOLLOW_THE_PROCESSING_OF_CLAIMS_SUB: Follow up on the processing of your complaint with complete transparency
Home.CLAIM_PROCESSED_SUB: Leave us your suggestions to improve the quality of our service
Home.HIW_SUBTEXT: You wish to make a claim online, please follow these steps
Home.HIW_X_HEAD: You wish to make a claim online, please follow these steps:
Home.HIW_X_THREE: 3. Enter your personal and travel data
Home.HIW_Y_HEAD: You have sent your claim and wish to follow it:
Home.HIW_Y_TWO: 2. Fill in your login and password
Home.HIW_Z_ONE: 1. Once your complaint is received, our advisor checks the accuracy of your personal and travel data
Home.HIW_Z_TWO: 2. In the event of incorrect or missing information, you receive an e-mail inviting you to complete it
Home.HIW_Z_THREE: 3. A response is then sent by e-mail or on the platform under 'Track my complaint'
Home.PROCESSING_CLAIM_SUB: To respond to your requests for information and/or complaints efficiently, ONCF has acquired tools ensuring 360 ° processing of your request. The ONCF gives you the possibility to make a complaint by phone, at the station or onboard and even online.
Home.ONCF_SUBT: We are very proud to serve you
Home.SUPPORT_HEADING: Our Employees Are At Your Disposal
Home.SUPPORT_PARA: Our staff are at your disposal to assist you in all stages of your journey and to assist you in making your trip as pleasant as possible.
Home.SUPPORT_ONE: Our Station agents welcome you and allow you to prepare your trip. They provide you with practical information, in normal or disturbed situations and assist you to facilitate your travel.
Home.SUPPORT_TWO: Our Train agents are at your service during your journey on the train.
Home.SUPPORT_THREE: Our customer relations center 2255 is available 24/7.
Home.LOST_OBJECTS_PARA: Have you lost an object at a station or train? Don't panic, we'll help you find it. Here are the steps to follow:
Home.LOST_TWO: Fill out the form on personal and travel data
Home.LOST_THREE: Choose the after-sales service category then select the 'Lost Objects' field
Home.LOST_FOUR: Write a message describing your lost object
Home.LOST_PARA: We recommend that you report this loss to our train or station staff as soon as possible by describing in detail your personal effect, its possible content and leaving your contact details so that we can reach you. Thanks to this report, we will immediately trigger useful searches to try to find your property.
Home.DO_YOU_HAVE_QUE: Do you have a question, an idea or a simple testimony?
Home.NAME1_TEXT: Very good complaint tracking tool by ONCF. I am glad that the ONCF has taken this initiative to listen to its customers.
Home.NAME2_TEXT: Oncf2255 gives travelers the means to express themselves directly and it creates the proximity link that was missing.
Home.FAQ_TEXT: Find the answers to the most frequently asked questions
Home.COMPLAINT1: I have not received a response to my online claim
Home.COMPLAINT2: I am not satisfied with the response I was given
Home.COMPLAINT3: I lost my travel ticket, can I make a claim online?
Home.COMPLAINT1_TXT: If there is no response within 30 days, we invite you to call our customer relations center by dialing 2255.
Home.COMPLAINT2_TXT: If the response you received seems insufficient, we invite you to contact the nearest station and make a handwritten request, making sure to provide more details on the reasons for your dissatisfaction.
Home.COMPLAINT3_TXT: To make your claim online, you must have your travel ticket which is proof that your trip has taken place.

Claim.PROCESS_CLAIM: Fill the form to process your claim
Claim.FILE_TEXT: This is some placeholder block-level help text for the above input. It's a bit lighter and easily wraps to a new line.
Claim.MAX_SIZE: Max size 2Mb - (BMP, JPG, JPEG, GIF, PNG, PDF),
Claim.PAGE_ALERT: The two Arrival / Departure stations must be different

ClaimStatus.NOTIFY_MSG: You will receive a notification once the complaint has been processed.

ErrorMsg.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME_REQUIRED_AR: Sub category name required in Arabic
